name: B E A N in my room
name_original: B E A N in my room
description:
Oh yes B E A N. If you are a fan of Dani, you might like it.

In this game, you are a small bean about 5-10 cm in my room.

Altough it's first person, you can see that you are a bean just by looking at your shadow.

I'm a kid, I tried my best and this is my first game so please don't hate me :(

and yes that'a queen poster that I have in real life, dont copyright strike me Brian.
